name: FNF Erase and Guess | FNF Online
name_original: FNF Erase and Guess | FNF Online
description:
FNF Erase and Guess - Friday Night Funkin guess the character

Ok, let's see how many of you know each character from this awesome game called Friday Night Funkin. I know that all of you know them when they see an image - but if you see just a silhouette, you will recognize it?

The game has around 30 levels, so you will need to find 30 different characters from the show. Scratch or erase the mask to see the silhouette. Think, and choose the correct answer.

Was ok? You will move forward - it wasn't? You will lose time, points, one life or maybe you will lose the whole game!

Friday Night Funkin Super Cards - Unlock All

At the top of the game, you will have a button named Cards - click it. There you will find a nice card with each character you have found in the game.

Cool, no?

If you like this awesome fnf online game, don't forget to reply here, make videos with the game or share it.

Good luck, and have fun! :)
